document_title: Heart valve disease: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
Some factors that can increase the risk of heart valve disease are:
Age: By middle age, many people have leaky heart valves due to natural valve degeneration;; History of mitral valve prolapse;; History of infectious diseases;; History of myocardial ischemia or myocardial infarction;; History of high blood pressure, high cholesterol, diabetes and other heart disease risk factors;; Congenital heart disease.
Hypertension is one of the risk factors for valvular heart disease
